specifications: Drive with Confidence in the Legendary 2006 Toyota Tundra SR5! Get ready to embark on your next adventure with the impressive 2006 Toyota Tundra SR5 a truck that combines rugged durability with refined comfort. With its VIN 5TBDT44126S546946 this Tundra SR5 boasts a proud history with just one owner and with only 97 613 miles on the odometer it’s ready to take on many more journeys with you at the helm. Model: 2006 Toyota Tundra SR5 Body Style: 4-Door Extended Cab Pickup Engine: 4.7L V8 F DOHC 32V Fuel Type: Gasoline Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive with 4X4 Capability Highlighted Features: Powerful V8 Engine: Under the hood you’ll find a robust 4.7L V8 engine delivering the perfect blend of power and efficiency. Whether you’re hauling heavy loads or navigating tough terrain this engine is up to the task. Versatile 4X4 Capability: With both rear-wheel drive and 4X4 capability this Tundra SR5 offers exceptional traction and control in all driving conditions. From smooth highways to rugged off-road trails you can confidently conquer any terrain. Generous Bed Length: With a 6.2-foot bed length this Tundra SR5 provides ample space for all your cargo needs. Whether you’re loading up for a weekend camping trip or tackling a home improvement project you’ll have plenty of room to transport your gear. Convenient Features: Cruise control steering wheel-mounted controls and an electronic braking system enhance your driving experience while the power sliding rear window and rear privacy glass add comfort and convenience. Safety and Reliability: Equipped with features like approach lights tire pressure monitoring system and tow hooks this Tundra SR5 prioritizes your safety and peace of mind on the road. Plus the full-size spare tire ensures you’re prepared for unexpected emergencies. From its chrome grille to its rugged trailer hitch this Toyota Tundra SR5 is packed with features that cater to your every need. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to own this well-maintained truck that’s ready to tackle whatever challenges lie ahead.
